code: import{AUTH}from"../types";var initialState=null;export var userReducer=function userReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case AUTH.USER_LOGGEDIN:return action.user;case AUTH.USER_LOGGEDOUT:return initialState;default:return state;}};
